page.title: 09CARAVAN SITE.
page.content: Shore Mills is a long, narrow strip of land with a house and camping site, about 3 miles out of the old fishing village of Cromarty on the east - west coast road. The camping site is not exactly massive, only about 50 metres long by 20 metres wide, but big enough for the custom it gets. The owner lives in the long, old house by the side of the camp site. The Black-Isle is a very interesting place to spend a holidy and Shore Mills is a good position for travelling around. The old fishing village of Cromarty is full of interesting facts, history and architecture. There are also lots of other interesting places on the Black-Isle such as Fortrose Cathedral, and there are some very attractive views around as well.
